## Summary
- Thursday's flight (PI Jakob):
  - Southeastern and south circle likely on moist margins.
  - Northwestern and center circle inside moist margins.
  - Deep convection expected over northwestern flight area

- Saturday's flight (PI Julia):
  - Western circles likely outside moist margins. Eastern circles likely inside moist margins Middle circles likely to sample the doldrums.
  - No large areas of deep convection expected along the flight track.
  - Possible tropical cyclone development to the north of the track.
